channel.title: CVE Feed for FreePBX -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for FreePBX -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-47071|2024-10-01T16:15:01.398Z -- freepbx -- security-reporting
item.description: OSS Endpoint Manager is an endpoint manager module for FreePBX. OSS Endpoint Manager module activation can allow authenticated web users unauthorized access to read system files with the permissions of the webserver process. This vulnerability is fixed in 14.0.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-47071|2024-10-01T15:40:46.257Z -- freepbx -- security-reporting
item.description: OSS Endpoint Manager is an endpoint manager module for FreePBX. OSS Endpoint Manager module activation can allow authenticated web users unauthorized access to read system files with the permissions of the webserver process. This vulnerability is fixed in 14.0.4.
